Texts.Chs: 啊，船长，有什么要给我的？我以前见过这样的罩壳。我想我可以帮你修好它。
Texts.Eng: Ah, Captain, what do you have for me? Hmm, I have seen casings like these before. I think I can repair it for you.

Texts.Chs: 我发现了一些古代工具的破损外壳。^green;如果我能找到一个懂得天人技术的人，也许它能够被修好。^reset;
Texts.Eng: I found the broken casing of some ancient tool. ^green;If I can find someone who knows Centensian technology, they may be able to repair it.^reset;
